alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Sumner; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:25PM CDT until June 29 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1224 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gallatin, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Lebanon, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, Millersville, Lakewood, Hermitage, Rural Hill, Belinda City, Old Hickory, Green Hill, Percy Priest Lake and Gladeville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
